member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleDropIndexConfiguration
member.summary: DropIndex operation can be customized with the OracleDropIndexConfiguration class.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAddColumnConfiguration
member.summary: AddColumn operation can be customized with the OracleAddColumnConfiguration class. See http://www.devart.com/blogs/dotconnect/index.php/entity-framework-code-first-migrations-support-for-oracle-mysql-postgresql-and-sqlite.html#DatabaseSpecific

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAddColumnConfiguration.NotNullConstraintName
member.summary: The name of the NOT NULL constraint. By default, an unnamed NOT NULL constraint is created

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAddColumnConfiguration.CheckConstraintName
member.summary: The name of the check constraint.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAddColumnConfiguration.CheckConstraintExpression
member.summary: The expression of the сheck constraint (for example, “COLUMN_NAME IN (‘A’, ‘B’, ‘C’)”).

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAddColumnConfiguration.VirtualColumnExpression
member.summary: The expression for the virtual column (for example, “FIRST_COLUMN * SECOND_COLUMN – THIRD_COLUMN”).

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleDropTableConfiguration
member.summary: DropTable operation can be customized with the OracleDropTableConfiguration class.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleDropTableConfiguration.IdentitySequenceDroppingEnabled
member.summary: Determines whether to delete a sequence.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleDropTableConfiguration.IdentitySequenceName
member.summary: The name of the sequence.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateIndexConfiguration
member.summary: CreateIndex operation can be customized with the OracleCreateIndexConfiguration class. See http://www.devart.com/blogs/dotconnect/index.php/entity-framework-code-first-migrations-support-for-oracle-mysql-postgresql-and-sqlite.html#DatabaseSpecific

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateIndexConfiguration.IsBitmap
member.summary: Determines whether to create a bitmap index. False by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateIndexConfiguration.Reversed
member.summary: Determines whether to create a reverse ordered index. False by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateIndexConfiguration.Unsorted
member.summary: Determines whether to create an unsorted index. False by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateIndexConfiguration.Unlogged
member.summary: Determines whether to create an unlogged index. False by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateIndexConfiguration.Expression
member.summary: Specifies the expression for the expression-based (function-based) index.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateIndexConfiguration.Tablespace
member.summary: Specifies TABLESPACE for an index.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAlterColumnConfiguration
member.summary: AlterColumn operation can be customized with the OracleAlterColumnConfiguration class. See http://www.devart.com/blogs/dotconnect/index.php/entity-framework-code-first-migrations-support-for-oracle-mysql-postgresql-and-sqlite.html#DatabaseSpecific

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAlterColumnConfiguration.LobModificationAllowed
member.summary: Determines whether to allow LOB column modification. Data type is not modified, only other column parameters are modified. False by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAlterColumnConfiguration.DataTypeAlteringEnabled
member.summary: Determines whether to modify data type. True by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAlterColumnConfiguration.DefaultValueAlteringEnabled
member.summary: Determines whether to modify the default value. True by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAlterColumnConfiguration.NullableAlteringEnabled
member.summary: Determines whether to modify NULL/NOT NULL constraint. True by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleAlterColumnConfiguration.ErrorCatchingForNullableAltering
member.summary: Determines whether to generate an additional DDL code for catching and processing errors that occur in case of unsuccessful modification of the NULL/NOT NULL constraint for columns that have the same nullability as the one applied by this modification. True by default.

member.name: T:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateTableConfiguration
member.summary: CreateTable operation can be customized with the OracleCreateTableConfiguration class. See http://www.devart.com/blogs/dotconnect/index.php/entity-framework-code-first-migrations-support-for-oracle-mysql-postgresql-and-sqlite.html#DatabaseSpecific

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateTableConfiguration.Tablespace
member.summary: Specifies TABLESPACE for the table.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateTableConfiguration.Unlogged
member.summary: If set to True, an unlogged table is created. False by default.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateTableConfiguration.IdentityTriggerName
member.summary: The name of the trigger. If the primary key is specified as database-generated (Identity option), then a sequence and an insert trigger will be generated for this table to make this column autoincrement.

member.name: P:Devart.Data.Oracle.Entity.Migrations.OracleCreateTableConfiguration.IdentitySequenceName
member.summary: The name of the sequence. If the primary key is specified as database-generated (Identity option), then a sequence and an insert trigger will be generated for this table to make this column autoincrement.
